00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_SPLIT_PREDICATE_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_SPLIT_PREDICATE_H

00025 namespace Hypertable {
00026 
00029   class SplitPredicate {
00030   public:
00031     SplitPredicate() : m_split_pending(false) { }
00032 
00033     void load(const String &split_row, bool split_off_high) {
00034       m_split_row_str = split_row;
00035       m_split_row = m_split_row_str.c_str();
00036       m_split_off_high = split_off_high;
00037       m_split_pending = true;
00038     }
00039 
00040     bool split_off(const char *row) {
00041       int cmp = strcmp(row, m_split_row);
00042       return ((cmp <= 0 && !m_split_off_high) || (cmp > 0 && m_split_off_high));
00043     }
00044 
00045     void clear() { m_split_pending = false; }
00046 
00047     bool split_pending() { return m_split_pending; }
00048 
00049   private:
00050     String m_split_row_str;
00051     const char *m_split_row;
00052     bool m_split_off_high;
00053     bool m_split_pending;
00054   };
00055 
00056 }
